game.name: Hospital 666
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hospital 666은 1~4인용 공포 탈출 게임입니다. 이상한 현상의 발생을 관찰하고 올바른 엘리베이터를 선택하면서 으스스한 병원 층을 횡단하세요. 몇몇 비정상적인 보스들이 당신을 죽음으로 쫓아올 것이고, 당신은 그들을 탈출할 올바른 방법을 찾아야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hospital 666 is a 1-4 player horror escape game. Traverse through eerie hospital levels while observing the occurrence of anomalies and choosing the correct elevator. Some abnormal bosses will chase you to death, and you must find the right way to escape them.

reviewHighlights.text: I had no dislikes. It was good game, very mind messing with you. Can't wait to play school 666
Trying to complete hell mode is making me have a stroke 10/10
